name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.memoryMongoDbChat
description: Stores the chat history in MongoDB collection.

properties.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
properties.name: notice

options.name: Connected Chat Trigger Node
options.description: Looks for an input field called 'sessionId' that is coming from a directly connected Chat Trigger

options.name: Define below
options.description: Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text

properties.name: sessionKey
properties.description: The key to use to store session ID in the memory

properties.name: collectionName
properties.description: The collection name to store the chat history in. If collection does not exist, it will be created.

properties.name: databaseName
properties.description: The database name to store the chat history in. If not provided, the database from credentials will be used.

properties.name: contextWindowLength
properties.hint: How many past interactions the model receives as context
